page.title: 05SHOPPING IN HOLME HALL.
page.content: One of the{first businesses}to become established at{Holme Hall}at{Wardgate {Way}was the{Milco Supermarket.}The {Supermarket}was set up to cater for the growing demand for{goods}and {services}as the local community grew in size.All kinds of{foods and other {goods}are sold there.There is even a {video lending libary}with a local delivery service.People will be able to play on the{video machines}which will be provided at the{supermarket.At the moment the{cash tills}are operated {electronically}by an{assistant.}The latest{machines,}not yet installed at{Milco,}are called{lazer scanning {systems}for recording prices and adding-up the prices.{The wool}and {flower craft shop}have a large selection of goods. There is{Doctor's {Surgery, 2 Dentists,Fish & Chip Shop.
